title: Master of Movement
description: Learn and master the art of movement (use WASD).

title: Master of Combat
description: Learn and master the art of combat (use Left Click).

title: Master of Dodging
description: Learn and master the art of dodging (use Shift).

title: The Book
description: Open you're bestiary and learn about the creatures you've encountered (use Tab).

title: Potions Everywhere
description: Select from the potion inventory a Vita Potion (use P) and heal yourself (use Q).

title: Speak with the Barkeeper
description: Speak with the barkeeper and learn about the world around you.\nThe tavern is located in the center of the village.
